div.ab: The sea rages so violently against the walls as to have destroyed a sentry box at the angle of a bastion. The houses very damp the air being filled with the spray even when there is not any wind. The fortification toward the isthmus strong & not wide. The isthmus occupied by a road on each side of which seats of marble & beyond these gardens. The road is perfectly straight for some miles. A new cut is now making about a cannonshot from the city from the sea to the port, by way of defences the whole island being only separated from the terra firma dry land by a narrow channel in some places not deep at low water though dangerously muddy. There is a bridge over it. It is said 25 000 men would be necessary to defend the whole. The two points of St Catalina & Castel Gordo on the main land are within the reach of shells.
